title: How to Draw Dirt Bikes

steps.headline: Gather all the necessary instruments like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum.
steps.description: For coloring, you can chose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors. Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely.

steps.headline: Draw a rectangle and a line.
Add a curved line, a rectangle, an oval and a triangle.
Draw two circles, a rectangle and a line.
Add some small shapes, as shown.
Add four circles.
steps.description: Draw two inside the circles you have previously drawn, and two outside.

steps.headline: Draw the rest of the details.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
text: Gather all the necessary instruments like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum. For coloring, you can chose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors. Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely. Draw a rectangle and a line.  Add a curved line, a rectangle, an oval and a triangle.  Draw two circles, a rectangle and a line.  Add some small shapes, as shown.  Add four circles. Draw two inside the circles you have previously drawn, and two outside. Draw the rest of the details.  Erase the guidelines.  Start coloring!  Finished.
sentences: Gather all the necessary instruments like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum.
For coloring, you can chose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors.
Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely.
Draw a rectangle and a line.
Add a curved line, a rectangle, an oval and a triangle.
Draw two circles, a rectangle and a line.
Add some small shapes, as shown.
Draw two inside the circles you have previously drawn, and two outside.
Draw the rest of the details.
